alert.note: Alert for St. Croix (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 9:43PM CDT until August 27 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1000 PM CDT FOR WESTERN ST. CROIX COUNTY... At 942 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near New Richmond to near Roberts, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... New Richmond, Somerset, Roberts, Star Prairie, Boardman, Huntington, New Richmond Airport, Houlton, Burkhardt and Willow River State Park. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Remain alert for a possible tornado! Tornadoes can develop quickly from severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado go at once into the basement or small central room in a sturdy structure.
